response.overview: Ingi, a young father wrestling with a haunting secret, is shaken when he uncovers the lifeless body of his reclusive tenant, a victim of apparent suicide. Amidst the grim scene, Ingi stumbles upon a series of enigmatic clues: cryptic messages, a perplexing box, and haunting audio recordings capturing his tenant's final moments. As he delves into the recordings, Ingi becomes consumed by a creeping dread, convinced that he's being ensnared by the same malevolent force that drove his tenant to a violent demise. Trapped in a chilling spiral of paranoia and terror, Ingi races against time to unravel the sinister mystery before it consumes him and those he holds dear.
response.title: Delirium
